snippet.title: Project Anomaly - Pilot Episode Trailer
snippet.description:
DEMO AVAILABLE NOW: https://darksciencelabs.itch.io/projectanomaly-pilot

Project Anomaly: Urban Supernatural Investigator is a 2.5D first-person adventure mystery game where you play as an investigator who solves local cases by taking pictures & understanding cryptids, folklore, & mythological creatures from different cultures in an open world environment. 

The free demo will be released on the 8th of October 2021 on our itch.io page: https://darksciencelabs.itch.io/. At the moment, the demo is done but the optimization for lower spec devices is not finished yet. If you are interested in participating for early testing, please contact adlanarvyanda@gmail.com. 

For more updates, feel free to follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/DarkScienceLabs
https://twitter.com/adlanarv
